summary: A quick edit for IA Armor V6 set to use Skyre 0.99.20/21 for ppl that cant wait for the proper patch from ppl that know IA better.
descriptionHtml:
A quick edit for IA Armor set to use Skyre 0.99.20/21 for ppl that cant wait for the proper patch from ppl that know IA better. 

This include all the armor set except spellbinder Armor because I cant find the entry in Creation Kit 

This does not include the meltdown recipe.


You will need to download & install Immersive Armor v6 from hothtrooper44 Skyrim @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733

then just replace his hothtrooper44_ArmorCompilation.esp with mine to get the new armor rating

[Quote] from hothtrooper44 
If your mod is dependent upon this one and does not re-host any of it\'s files, no permission is needed.
[/Quote]
author: Khazdingo

files.name: Immersive Armor V6 Esp replacement for Skyre
files.fileName: Immersive Armor V6 Esp replacement for Skyre-27025-0-2.7z
